entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
